Grants all of the following effects when the user is attacking with a move or sync move:
Ignores passive skills that would reduce the damage of attacks.
Ignores passive skills that would protect the target against a critical hit.
Ignores the target’s Enduring effect.

(Each additional sync pair powers up moves by [Digit:2digits Idx="2" ]% and reduces damage by 3%. p999508: Reduces the damage all allied sync pairs take when attacked by Water-type moves.
p999507: Powers up the physical attack moves of all allied sync pairs by [Digit:2digits ]%. Reduces physical attack move damage taken by all allied sync pairs by [Digit:2digits Idx="1" ]%. The more allied sync pairs with the Hoenn theme you have on your team, the higher these percentages are. (Each additional sync pair powers up moves by [Digit:2digits Idx="2" ]% and reduces damage by 3%. The maximum power-up is [Digit:2digits Idx="3" ]%, and the maximum damage reduction is [Digit:2digits Idx="4" ]%.)
p999506: Powers up the special attack moves of all allied sync pairs by [Digit:2digits ]%. Reduces special attack move damage taken by all allied sync pairs by [Digit:2digits Idx="1" ]%. The more allied sync pairs with the Hoenn theme you have on your team, the higher these percentages are. (Each additional sync pair powers up moves by [Digit:2digits Idx="2" ]% and reduces damage by 3%. The maximum power-up is [Digit:2digits Idx="3" ]%, and the maximum damage reduction is [Digit:2digits Idx="4" ]%.)
p999505: Charges the user’s move gauge by [Digit:1digit ] when it nullifies an opponent’s move while in a defensive posture.
p999504: Powers up the moves of all allied sync pairs by 10%. Reduces attack move damage taken by all allied sync pairs by 10%. The more allied sync pairs with the Rock theme you have on your team, the higher these percentages are. (Each additional sync pair powers up moves by 5% and reduces damage by 2%. The maximum power-up is 20%, and the maximum damage reduction is 14%.)
p999503: Powers up the moves of all allied sync pairs by 10%. Reduces attack move damage taken by all allied sync pairs by 10%. The more allied sync pairs with the Fighting theme you have on your team, the higher these percentages are. (Each additional sync pair powers up moves by 5% and reduces damage by 2%. The maximum power-up is 20%, and the maximum damage reduction is 14%.)
p999502: The user’s Sp. Def increases 50% when the field is Psychic Terrain.
